title: Vessel
marks:
Signature, Date, Inscription and Sticker

see Si on bottom, incised: [Mike Schuler #1147 2005]
text: Like fellow artists Gianfranco Angelino and Virginia Dotson, whose work is also seen here, Shuler does not begin with a solid piece of wood, but constructs a block from individual pieces--here exotic hardwoods--and turns the resulting laminate piece to an amazing thinnness.  Shuler does not use any stains or dyes; he relies on the colors and patterns of the wood to create a striking mosaic.
description: widely-flaring conical shape on very small ring foot; seven bands made up of tiny bars with wood grain generally on alternating diagonals, lighter paired with darker; tiny radiating bars at bottom; golden brown generally with dark brown grains; high gloss finish
creditline: Gift of Daniel Greenberg and Susan Steinhauser
